title: Segmenting DNA sequence into 'words' based on statistical language model

tldr.text: This paper designs an unsupervised ‘probability approach to word segmentation’ method to segment the DNA sequences and finds different genomes may use the similar language, but belong to different branches, just like the English and French/Latin.
